entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 8.
